# Introduction

To retrieve a list of tables:


```{r}
dfs <- get_dataflows()
dfs[1:5, 1:4]
```

To retrieve a dataflow info:

```{r}
flowRef <- dfs$flowRef[4]
print(flowRef)

df <- get_dataflow_info(flowRef = flowRef)
df
```

obs <-   obs <- get_observations(id="DF_37230ned", agencyID="NL1.CNVT")
